Transcription for 547492

So ставь vomiting в Mateus
And listen to what I have to say
Naw e hu salary
Very hard work you do
O'er the land I will weather there,
A-tah-nah-vah-nah-yah-nu-kai-pre-e.
Tah-vah-nah-veh-ru-keh-ven-pre-e,
Tah-vah-vah-vah-vah-nah-yah-nu-kai-pre-e.
Tah-vah-nah-veh-ru-keh-ven-pre-e,
Me-dow-ing-t-veh-ve-yah-nu-kai-pre-e.
Let me run with my love on air,
Am not on irkwah from meti-plea.
Tah-vah-nah-veh-ru-keh-ven-pre-e,
Me-dow-ing-t-veh-ve-yah-nu-kai-pre-e.
Tah-vah-nah-veh-ru-keh-ven-pre-e,
Me-dow-ing-t-veh-veh-yah-nu-kai-pre-e.
Let me run with my love on air,
Am not on irkwah from meti-plea.
